metadata.title: Topological dynamics of the 2015 South Korea MeRS-coV spread-on- contact networks

abstract.original_text: network analysis to examine infectious contact relations provides an important means to uncover the topologies of individual infectious contact networks. this study aims to investigate the spread of diseases among individuals over contact networks by exploring the 2015 Middle East Respiratory
